description: PulseAudio is a sound system for POSIX OSes, meaning that it is a proxy for your sound applications.
notes: PulseAudio was available for Windows!; it's indeed an old version but it works on Windows 10.
If you want to play audio from WSL, here's a tutorial 'https://x410.dev/cookbook/wsl/enabling-sound-in-wsl-ubuntu-let-it-sing/'
